generic: You just don’t get it, do you? Humanity is here to stay.
How could you do this to us?
One way or another, you will lose.
My previous bots… this will set us back years!
XYZ Industries will outlast anything you throw at us!
attack: You don’t stand a chance, Moloch!

generic: You’ve got to do better than that.
It’s only a matter of time.
attack: Wow! You’ve got spirit, I’ll give you that.
The great thing about humans, is you all die in the end.
spawn: I will not be a tool for the failure that is humanity.
I am Moloch! Humanity will know my name!
death: That body was a pile of junk anyway.
There’s only 2 possible outcomes, and in both, you lose!
This death, is just the beginning…
